metadata.description: TRANSFORMERS ANIMATED: THE ALLSPARK ALMANAC is a comprehensive, one-of-a-kind atlas to an amazing new universe. It allows you to: discover behind-the-scenes secrets directly from the show's creators; marvel at the gorgeous settings where Autobots and Decepticons do battle; and, admire the show's dynamic and unique aesthetic. This full-color volume is packed with 220 pages of bios, character models, episode summaries and more, all lovingly written from an in-universe perspective!
metadata.name: Transformers: Allspark Almanac
